Title: SlackerBrowser - Very Simple Winform Browser in WPF App
Description: Simple web browser project for those interested in more control of the user experience.  All in under 100 lines of code.
HomeWiki:
I recently required a custom locked down web browser for use in a virtual desktop environment. I'm sharing it for those who can use and expand on it.

It is a WPF app that uses integrated Winform WebBrowser control; WPF version of WebBrowser does not have the WebBrowserShortcutsEnabled property, and I didn't want to write keypress monitor to disable browser shortcuts.

The complete source is in less than 100 lines of code.
